attributes.action: WANT OUR LIVES BACK BY RETHINKING THE SMOKING BAN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the smoking ban we have lost a large part of our freedom, all non-smokers wanted this ban but now that they have got it the majority have soon changed their tune as pubs, restuaraunts etc are now closing down, i refuse to go out to spend my time outside smoking where i could easily become ill through being cold, we use to beable to go out and enjoy ourselves but now it is like a chore, the atmosphere is not like it use to be, we are human beings and should beable to have a little freedom in our lives, lets have our lives back by allowing certain places ie: pubs restauraunts etc have the option once again whether to allow smoking or not

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
